name: KB Tool
description: Multi-tool reasoning over a fictional knowledge base. 25 questions requiring 2-4 chained tool calls (search, lookup, calculate). Designed so a single LLM call cannot answer (fictional entities not in training data). Different architectures lead to measurably different performance.
design_notes: 5 question types x 5 each: chain lookup (2 calls), multi-hop (3 calls), aggregation (3-4 calls), comparison (3 calls), temporal (3 calls). All entities are fictional so LLM knowledge alone gives 0%. Tools must be chained: output of search feeds input to lookup, etc.

examples.question: What city is the headquarters of the company that manufactures the NeuroSync Headset?
What city is the headquarters of the company that manufactures the SunLink Base Station?
Who founded the company that makes the Sentinel Warehouse Robot?
What is the name of the company that produces the DeepScanner Sonar Array?
How many employees work at the company that makes the VoltCell Battery Pack?
What university did the founder of Helios Quantum attend?
In what country is the headquarters of the company founded by the person who won the Atlas Humanitarian Tech Prize and works in mobile technology?
What degree did the founder of Nexus AI Labs earn?
What is the population of the city where Aether Robotics is headquartered?
What organization gives out the award won by the QubitX Processor?
What is the total number of employees across all companies headquartered in Portland?
What is the combined revenue of all companies headquartered in Osaka?
How many people in the knowledge base attended Kanto Technical University?
What is the total price of all products manufactured by Helios Quantum?
How many awards have been won by products from Aether Robotics?
Which costs more, the NeuroSync Headset or the VoltCell Battery Pack?
Which company has more employees, Helios Quantum or Solaris Mobile?
Which company has higher revenue, Oceanic Data Systems or TerraVolt Energy?
Which product launched more recently, the Sentinel Warehouse Robot or the Atlas Industrial Arm?
Which city has a larger population, the headquarters city of Helios Quantum or the headquarters city of Nexus AI Labs?
Was Aether Robotics founded before or after the founder of Helios Quantum received her PhD?
Was Nexus AI Labs founded before or after the Zenith Prize for Innovation was established?
Was the SkySeed Agricultural Drone launched before or after Canopy Drones was founded?
How many years passed between the founding of Lakeview University and the founding of Savannah College of Science?
Did Marcus Tanaka finish his degree before or after Carlos Rivera finished his?
